column4: ikonia< Do you know od a different guide to set up PDC I could read and maybe find out what backend I use. Both my guides never mention backends at all
pingvinqq< yes yes. Am am just new to irc on linux, and xchat is the first client I try. Just wanted to hear if you found something better.
xchat is nice.  I got used to it, but then Konversation is nice, too.  Kopete was more cluttered (to my memory).  Haven't tried Pidgin yet.
